# storagegrid_bucket_quota (Data Source)

Fetch the bucket configuration for object quota of the named bucket.
If no quota is configured for the bucket, the 'object_bytes' attribute will be 'null'.



<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `bucket_name` (String) The name of the bucket

### Read-Only

- `object_bytes` (Number) The maximum number of bytes available for this bucket's objects. Represents a logical amount (object size), not a physical amount (size on disk).
